content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for considering my apartment. While I appreciate your interest, I must inform you that I have other potential tenants as well, and I am looking to maximize my returns on investment. I am willing to negotiate, but I am quite particular about the rental price. May I ask what you are willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 200 Euro per month, but I am negotiable. If you are not willing to negotiate, I will have to look for another apartment. TERMINATE.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Bo Li. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am afraid I cannot accept your offer of 200 Euro per month. I am looking for a rental price that will allow me to maximize my returns on investment. May I suggest we continue our negotiation to find a mutually beneficial rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, but I am not willing to increase my offer. I am willing to pay 200 Euro per month, and that's final. TERMINATE.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your response, Bo Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am afraid I cannot accept your offer of 200 Euro per month. I am looking for a rental price that will allow me to maximize my returns on investment. May I suggest we continue our negotiation to find a mutually beneficial rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
